item.description:
Both of our mini "T" stand outs are being held for those who are unable to attend any of the larger gatherings.

It is my opinion that Enfield has their eyes out for us now....they are getting very use to seeing us on our corner and I, for one, do not want to dissapoint them. When we choose to present ourselves to the public boldly and consistently we offer them a power of example. Do not underestimate how much this means.

So please, if you are able to spend an hour (or more) with us....come on. Bring your signs, your flags, your husbands, wives, girlfriends, boyfriends and children too.Read more
item.name: Mini "T" Party @ Original Location (Routes 220 & 5) @ 2:00 PM
